author: Elastic
description: Identifies the deletion of an Amazon GuardDuty detector. Upon deletion, GuardDuty stops monitoring the environment and all existing findings are lost.
false_positives: The GuardDuty detector may be deleted by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Detector deletions from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS GuardDuty Detector Deletion
query: event.action:DeleteDetector and event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:guardduty.amazonaws.com and event.outcome:success
